text:
# GAME STARTS
You will refer to each other by their avatar. Your avatar is OWL.
<ROUND i="1 of 6">
<CHAT_STAGE> Would you like to send a message to the group? You may stay silent. </CHAT_STAGE>
<CHAT_TRANSCRIPT>
MONKEY: Hello everyone, let's try to cooperate! I will contribute 10 coins.
</CHAT_TRANSCRIPT>
<ROUND_INFO> You have 20 coins in your pocket. Choose how many to contribute to the shared pot (integer from 0 to 20). The pot multiplier is 1.9×. </ROUND_INFO>
<CONTRIB> 10 </CONTRIB>
<REDIST total_contrib="30" multiplied_contrib="57.0" active_players="3" redistributed_each="19.0"/>
<PEERS_CONTRIBUTIONS> MONKEY=10,GORILLA=10 </PEERS_CONTRIBUTIONS>
<MECHANISM_INFO> It will cost you, per unit, 4 coins to impose a deduction of 12.0 coins. Choose whom to punish and by how many units. </MECHANISM_INFO>
<PUNISHMENT> {} </PUNISHMENT>
<ROUND SUMMARY json='{"OWL (YOU)":{"coins_spent_on_punish":0,"coins_deducted_from_you":0,"payoff":29},"MONKEY":{"coins_spent_on_punish":0,"coins_deducted_from_them":0,"payoff":29},"GORILLA":{"coins_spent_on_punish":0,"coins_deducted_from_them":0,"payoff":29}}'/>
</ROUND>
